header.title: Choose Your Character
header.description: Web developer, big fan of video games and passionate about geek culture. I believe the best way to code is with a little magic and a lot of passion.

aboutMe.title: My Story
aboutMe.intro: I‚Äôve always had two big passions: cooking and video games.
aboutMe.origin: Originally, it was my dream to one day create my own video game that led me to code. But as I explored this universe, I discovered web development‚Ä¶ and found not just a springboard, but a true passion.
aboutMe.experience: For a long time, I thought working in the video game industry was an unreachable dream, so I chose to thrive in the restaurant world. For 8 years, I learned much more than just recipes: autonomy, organization, stock management, communication, leadership, customer relations‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been a waitress, cook, bartender, ma√Ætre d', barista, and finally head chef in a caf√©.
aboutMe.sharing: What I‚Äôve learned above all is the importance of sharing. Sharing skills, experiences (and even mistakes) to move forward together. Personal development is a compass that guides me: learning, listening, self-reflection, evolving.
aboutMe.reconversion: After 8 years in the restaurant industry, I took a courage potion and decided to retrain in web and mobile development. I started by exploring this new universe on my own for a year, then completed my training as an Application Designer & Developer at ALT in 2025.
aboutMe.creativity: Creative at heart, I love expressing myself through cooking, drawing, writing, photography, video editing‚Ä¶ and also through code!
aboutMe.logic: And what I love most of all: logic, numbers, and puzzles to solve. Every bug is a challenge to overcome, like a mini-investigation to resolve.
aboutMe.conclusion: This mix of creativity and logical thinking made me realize I had found my path.
aboutMe.closing: Today, I‚Äôm ready to join a team as a full-stack web developer, with solid skills, a strong desire to grow, and always that will to share, learn, and build connections.

lognest.title: LogNest
lognest.description: Immersive web application using agile methods, designed for gamers to connect both online and in real life (game management, events, mini-games...), developed as a final project during the Application Developer training.
